meanings.definition: A person who is opposed to snobbery.
meanings.sent1: My friend is an antisnob and always treats everyone equally.
meanings.sent2: The antisnob in our group never judges others based on their clothes or possessions.
meanings.sent3: The antisnob at the party made everyone feel welcome and comfortable.
meanings.sent4: Being an antisnob is like having a superpower against unfair judgment.
meanings.sent5: The antisnob's kindness and acceptance shine brightly in a world of snobbery.

meanings.definition: Showing or characterized by opposition to snobbery.
meanings.sent1: Her antisnob attitude made her popular among her classmates.
meanings.sent2: The antisnob comments from the teacher encouraged inclusivity in the classroom.
meanings.sent3: The antisnob fashion trend rejected expensive brands in favor of comfort.
meanings.sent4: His antisnob behavior challenged the elitist norms of the art world.
meanings.sent5: The antisnob approach to life brought joy and authenticity to every interaction.
